scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend-ai-video" "npm run dev:backend-ai-image" "npm run dev:backend-tools" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend-ai-video: cd backend-ai-video && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-exclude 'uploads/*' --reload-exclude 'outputs/*' --reload-exclude 'frames/*' --reload-exclude 'temp_work/*' --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:backend-ai-image: cd backend-ai-image && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-exclude 'uploads/*' --reload-exclude 'outputs/*' --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8002
scripts.dev:backend-tools: cd backend-tools && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-exclude 'uploads/*' --reload-exclude 'outputs/*' --reload-exclude 'frames/*' --reload-exclude 'temp_work/*' --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend-ai-video && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../backend-ai-image && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../backend-tools && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
